resources.string: Our apologies! The program has crashed unexpectedly. Send error report?
Size of assets to be copied
Update check failed. Please restart the game.
Game version is outdated. Please download the latest version
Insufficient space. Please free up additional space in your internal storage or make sure an SD card has been inserted.
You are not connected to Wi-Fi. Update anyway?
我们需要使用您的语音权限以便您能体验游戏内的语音交流功能
我们需要使用您的存储空间权限以便游戏可以正常解压安装并进入
Are you sure you want to log out of your current account?
This account has already been bound.
Unable to bind. You are currently not logged in to an account.
Are you sure you want to create new game data?
The game data has been bound. You can recover it by switching to the corresponding account.
Account recovered and password reset. You will now be re-logged in.
Account recovered and password reset. All associated third-party platforms have been unbound. You will now be re-logged in.
iOS/Android game data is not interchangeable, and a single email address can only be registered to one platform.
Please bind your email to secure your account.
Register or bind your account to an email account to avoid data loss.
This email is already registered. Please try again with a different email.
Please enter your email account. A verification code will be sent to help you reset your password.
Note: Unauthenticated email accounts cannot reset a password using a verification code.
Unable to find any record of this email. Please enter again.
I have carefully read and agreed to the %1$s %2$s.
Please read and agree to the %1$s %2$s

"Welcome to the User Experience Improvement Plan. We would like to contact you via email and hear about your opinions and suggestions, so that we may further improve your gaming experience.
If you do not want to participate, you can press the skip button to enter the game.
We guarantee that your email address will only be used to contact you in regards to the User Experience Improvement Plan. Should you have any queries concerning privacy, you can check the privacy policy.
Happy gaming!"
Please enter your contact email address
Account transferred. You can continue the game on this device.
"%1$s account has changed, this login will use the new account. If you wish to use the old account, please switch account via %2$s and try it again."
Failed to log in to %1$s account. Logging in with a new guest account.
Please install a web browser first before using your Nintendo account.
Invalid login. Please log in again.
Slow connection. Please check your connection and try again.
You can not access the services related to Google. Please grant the required Google permissions in \"Settings - Manage Apps\" of the device.
Google Services version too low. Please download and install the latest version of Google Services.
Your device does not currently support Google Play services. Please contact the manufacturer for support.
You are currently logged in with a guest account. We recommend that you bind the account in the user center to prevent any accidental data loss.
The current guest account has not bound a third-party account, please bind now to avoid potential data loss.
Your account has already been bound. Log in as a new guest?
After %1$ss, you will be logged in as a guest account.
"Transfer code generated and saved to your device's Album."
Transfer code generated, please keep it safe.
Set a 6-16 Character Transfer Code Password
Please generate a transfer code for the current guest account to prevent data loss.
The data on the current guest account may be lost after switching to another account. Switch anyway?
Failed to log in to %1$s account. Would you like to log in with a guest account?
Reminder: Bind your account as soon as possible to avoid data loss.
Welcome back. Log in with your bound account?
Login failed. Please try switching networks or try again later.
Access error. Please set the correct date and time on the system and try again!
Too many requests, please try again later.
Will log in using a new guest account
"Log in with a new account? Note: You can switch back to the original account in the user center."
Failed to log in with TikTok account. Please install TikTok first.
Failed to log in with Twitter account. Please install Twitter first
Unknown account type. You may switch to or create an account in the user center.
Please calibrate system time for an optimal gaming experience.
Failed to log in with VK account. Please install VK first.
Failed to log in with WeChat account. Please install WeChat first.

"To comply with applicable laws, we require your age and location information. This will not be visible to other players. Refer to our Privacy Notice for information on how we collect, use, and share your data."
You have selected your location as %1$s and date of birth as %2$s. Confirm?
Enter your date of birth (year and month)
Your parent or legal guardian will receive an email (from @notice.easebar.com) to download the consent form. They will need to print out and sign the form.
Please confirm that %1$s is the email address of your parent or legal guardian, to make sure they could get the consent form.
If you still have not received the bind, try checking your spam folder.
Please enter the email address of your parent or legal guardian:
The file is too large. Please upload a photo within 10MB.
We collect, use, and share your information in accordance with our %1$s %2$s
The game consent form has been submitted. You may start the game after the manual review verification has been completed.
Please take a photo of the signed form and upload it to this page within 72 hours.
Note: Your age information is solely used for login authentication and will not be stored. Once confirmed, it cannot be modified.
"Please allow access to your device's storage to select the photo of the game consent form."
"Cannot select the photo as you have not granted access to your device's storage."
"Cannot select the photo as you have not granted access to your device's storage. Please approve the permission to use this feature."
To avoid loss of data, please authorize Storage permission.
To avoid loss of data, please go to app settings and authorize Storage permission.
The account was changed. The bound account has been updated in Google Play Games Service.
You are currently logged in to Play Games. Your gaming account will be bound to your Google Play Games Service.
You are currently logged in to Play Games. Game data recovered from Google Play Games Service.
"If you choose not to trust, the account credentials won't be saved, and you will need to manually log in again next time."
"You're logging in on an untrusted device. Trust the device now?"
Are you sure you want to remove this account from the quick login list?
Role ID cannot be left blank!
Role information cannot be left blank!
Please enter the correct verification code
Verification is required to change the backup email. Please enter your current backup mail address.
"A verification code has been sent to your current backup email address. If you haven't received the verification code, please check your spam folder."
Your personal information is secured and will not be disclosed to any third party or used for any other purpose.
Timed out while recovering account. Please try again later.
Accounts that are recovered using a backup email will become unbound. Remember to bind your account again as soon as possible.
Reminder: After recovering your account, please update your account binding information as soon as possible.
"A verification code has been sent to %1$s. If you haven't received the verification code, please check your spam folder."
Backup email bound. Remember to keep your email updated if there are any changes.
If you agree to bind a backup email for the purpose of account recovery, please enter an email you regularly use and tap Next.
"Once you bind a backup email, you'll be able to quickly recover your account in the unfortunate event you lose access to it. Remember to keep your email updated."
"A verification code has been sent to your current backup email address. If you haven't received the verification code, please check your spam folder."
Verification is required to remove the backup email. Please enter your current backup email address.
Backup Email has been upgraded to an email account and can be used as a login method.
Reenter your bound Backup Email address for verification.
Please register as an email account.
Set a login password to complete the upgrade.

Starting a new game will create an all-new guest account to replace the original one, and reset all the in-game data. Please be aware! The original guest account will be lost if it is not bound to another account.

"You have logged in with your original account. If you still wish to switch account, please visit %1$s and log into the account you wish to switch to. Then return to the User Center to switch account."
This type of account cannot be unbound.
Unbinding will make your account vulnerable. Are you sure you want to proceed?
Data error. Please try again later.
Please enable the required permissions in the system settings.
Please allow the app to access the camera
Failed to scan the QR code
This app needs access to your camera so you scan the QR code.
Camera is not accessible as permission is not granted，please allow camera permission in app settings
You are now logged in. Exit the app?
QR code not recognised. Please scan the PC login QR code.
Cannot scan the image as you have not granted access to your Photos. Please accept the permission to use this feature.
"Please allow access to your Photos to scan the image's code."
Please allow the app to access storage
Please align QR code within frame to scan
Failed to open the camera, please restart the phone and try again!
Access error. Switch networks and try again!
Access error. Please set the correct date on the system and try again!
Service busy, please try again later
Scanning function cannot be used due to a lack of permission.
Please allow access to the camera.
Invalid QR Code, please scan correct QR Code
Account remembered. To change your PC login credentials, please log in and navigate to the \"User Center - Login Settings\" page.
